text:
Hinako Aoki(青木 日菜子)

A wife who is lonely due to her husband's work.

Nakita Kuramitsu(九羅密 吟鍛)

Nakita is a military officer that briefly appears at the end of episode 16. He pointedly questions Minami Kuramitsu as to why he is sending the Chobimaru to Earth with Misao to rescue Mihoshi without his authorization. Nakita warns him that since Earth is an undeveloped world, he would risk having the Earthlings see it and cause a general panic. After realizing that Minami intends to destroy the Earth, Nakita knows that Minami is risking a war between the Kuramitsu family and Jurai and also points out that he has a message that Mikami Kuramitsu will sell one of his garden planets if the Chobimaru were to be damaged in the attack. Nakita then gave Minami the other message from Lady Seto that she will buy the planet and enjoy watching Minami squirm, as she only intends to watch. (source: Wikipedia)

Jaco Teirimentenpibosshi(ティリメンテンピボッシ • ジャコ)

An alien cop who came to Earth to stop a dangerous invader. Jaco is an alien resembling a robot with a mainly light blue head, save for his purple scalp. He has yellow eyes, and his nose and mouth are very human. His entire body is purple as well. According to Jaco, he is the 3rd shortest out of the 38 Galactic Patrolmen, at 148 cm (4' 10¼") Jaco is an alien who has a large amount of pride in his duties. He is also somewhat blank, as he was willing to use an Extinction Bomb to wipe out humanity just because Omori criticized them. He also views anyone who cannot live up to his expectations as inferior. However, this idea may be due to his extreme loyalty to his planet, so he will agree with their views on humanity. He also hates to be called short, as he nearly killed a civilian for it and also tends to get panicked quite easily. (Source: Dragonball Wikia)
candidates: Height complex / sensitive about his height
model_keywords: Height complex / sensitive about his height

text:
Uonuma Usui

Usui, the Blind Sword, used to be a swordsman working for the shogunate government. However, in a fight against Shishio Makoto, he was blinded. He possesses the Shingan (Eye of Heart), which actually is superhuman hearing that lets him hear another's heartbeat thus enabling him to sense people around him and detect the emotions of others. This ability is so advanced that it appears to be similar to the sonar of a dolphin or bat. Usui and Shishio made a deal upon Usui joining the Juppongatana: That Usui could try to kill Shishio anytime he gets the chance. Saito points out that deep down Usui knows he won't be able to kill Shishio and just boasts about killing him to hide that fact from everyone else. Saito also points out that Shishio knows this too and is just playing along to use Usui. Since Usui can't kill Shishio, he kills people weaker than himself to boost his ego. According to Cho, he is the second strongest of the Juppongatana. Usui fights using a short spear with a weighted end, the rochin, to attack, and a tortoise shell, the tinbei, as a shield to deflect attacks and block the enemy's vision. (Source: Wikipedia)

Sadai(サダイ)

Sadai (サダイ, Sadai) is an assailant who entered Land of Fire to capture Naho. He was on the national wanted list. Sadai and his group intercepted Naruto Uzumaki, Sakura Haruno and Naho. Naruto managed to defeat his comrades, but his Shadow Clone Techniques and Rasengan didn't work on him. After he captured the group, Sasuke Uchiha came and battled him. After discovering his taijutsu skills weren't enough, he used Fire Release: Great Fireball Technique to burn assailants armour, thus showing his true face. Sasuke defeated him using Chidori, and even after his defeat, Sasuke punched him severely because of his words about Itachi Uchiha and the Uchiha Clan Massacre and about weak Sasuke. Sasuke was only stopped by Kakashi, who reminded him that they should bring Sadai back for questioning. Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #196 (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Sadai )

Derkila(デルキラ)

Derkila is the One Demon King of the Demon World. He is the most powerful and influential demon in society, however, his whereabouts are currently unknown and thus he is called "The Missing Demon King".
candidates: Laid-back / Marches to her own beat

text:
Gen Fudou(不動GEN)

He conducted the expedition that retrieved the Vector Machines, and disappeared mysteriously since then. When the elements' battle against the Shadow Angels started, he returned in order to assume his position as Deava's supreme commander. Very knowledgeable of the human nature, he uses this wisdom to guide the pilots in order to help them to surpass their limitations and increase their teamwork

Noa(乃愛 / ノノア)

Nonoa is a rookie cosplayer who is a huge fan of Lilysa. She desperately wants to befriend her, but has trouble doing so due to her anxiety and insecurity. (Source: Wikipedia)
candidates: young lady from a wealthy family (ojousama)

text:
Aicho(藍朓)

Aicho, also called Aicho the Sky (空の藍朓 Sora no Aichou), is the former 10th Ninku corps (酉忍 Tori-nin, the rooster Ninku) captain and has extremely strong legs with an attitude to match, enabling him to cover large distances in a single bound and cause big damage on enemy machinery through his techniques. He also hates women, as this can be seen in his attitude towards Touji's sister, who has a crush on him. He also considers Touji an idiot. (Source: Wikipedia)

Fam Fan Fan(ファム・ファン・ファン)

Fam is a 15-year-old member of the Sky Pirates. Flying in a small vanship, Fam looks for aerial dogfights and battleships with her comrades and resells the ships to make a living. Fam has the potential to become a skilled vanship pilot but still lacks experience. From the bottom of her heart, she loves "peace in the free skies". Her signature aerial maneuver is the Split S. (Source: Official website)

Riho Tsukishima(月島 流星)

Riho Tsukishima, in her early twenties, is a waitress at Café Familia in Megami no Café Terrace. With her orange shoulder-length hair, blue eyes, and elegant demeanor, she exudes sophistication. Known for her sharp wit and confident personality, Riho often takes on a "big sister" role, balancing playful teasing with thoughtful guidance and maturity. Birthday: 7th August Height: 152cm Blood Type: A Likes: - Fashion - Fortunetelling - Pomeranians (Shiba Inu style) Dislikes: - Packed trains - Chicken skin - Cats stretching out really long

Noriki(ノリキ)

Constantly works in part time jobs to support his large family. Specializes in physical attack-based abilities. Socially awkward, taciturn, and very blunt with words. (Source: Genesis Horizon Wikia)

Kurachi(倉知)

Kurachi is shown to be Okina's secretary. Kurachi is well informed on the events on what's happening between the GHQ and its enemies. After Okina's death, she leads on what's left of the Kuhouin Group. She is an old friend of Haruka Ouma. (Source: Guilty Crown Wikia)

LaserMan.EXE(レーザーマン．ＥＸＥ)

LaserMan.EXE is the NetNavi of Dr. Regal, serving as both the second leader of the Darkloids (after overthrowing their previous leader ShadeMan.EXE) and a major antagonist from within the second half of Rockman.EXE Axess.

Eripiyo(えりぴよ)

The biggest fan of one of the less popular members, Maina, of the pop idol group Cham Jam. She's so obsessed with Maina that she says she would die to see her favourite girl play at the Budoukan.

Thunder(サンダー)

Lector and Thunder are a matched pair of highly specialized assassin dogs, sent by Hougen to kill Kyoshiro. When Weed drives them off, they switch targets, and after Weed allows them to leave after their second attack, Jerome kills them in defiance to Weed's orders. Thunder is only killed in the anime.

Nuwangi(ヌワンギ)

Nuwangi is the son of the local lord who lives near Yamayura and nephew of the late emperor of Kenashikourupe. He was raised by Tusukuru and was a childhood friend to Eruruu, however, he has abandoned all sense of respect for common villagers and acts as a part of the army in the name of his uncle. After usurping Benawi as Samurai General, Nuwangi uses his own personal army to crush one innocent village after another, even those that did not side with Hakuro. After he is defeated by Hakuro, Nuwangi is brought to the rebel HQ for punishment, which is left up to Eruruu. Not desiring any revenge, she allows Nuwangi to go free, much to his shock and bewilderment. She bids Nuwangi farewell as he wanders down a road into the morning mist, and is never seen again.

Hanna

A citizen of the Underground. Mother to Mari, Aru and Mei. She shelters Rumina, Chelsea and Ginnosuke when they enter the Underground.

Daruman(ダルマン / ホッパー)

A cranky penguin villager in the Animal Crossing series. He is a crested penguin named after the Rockhopper penguin, even though his design is based off a Macaroni Penguin (the two look quite similar to the untrained eye; however, they're both crested penguins). He also appeared in Doubutsu no Mori. Hopper is the only penguin with a cranky personality. He has appeared in all games of the Animal Crossing series. He also appears on the album cover for K.K. Parade. (Source: Animal Crossing Wiki)
candidates: hides feelings with a forced laugh

text:
Mr. Gaston(ガストン)

A doctor living in New York. He examined James, who had a heart attack, and Annie, who had collapsed from exhaustion.
candidates: Unable to be open about feelings

text:
Takeru Houjou(北条 猛（ほうじょう たける）)

Takeru's only dream was to beat his father and become the world's best martial artist and thus escapes from home. He decides to put his dream on hiatus and join forces with Professor Kazuki to save the earth. His body has a high resistance to electricity. (Source: AniDB)

Suneo's Great-Grandmother(スネ夫の曾祖母)

Suneo's paternal great-grandmother uses old wives' tales to impart values and good habits to Suneo. She is 93 years old. She always says idioms to Suneo. She likes sweets. By her appearance she looks like a really old woman. Also rather than the rest of her family, she is the only one who doesn't have a fox-faced shape. (Source: Doraemon Wiki)

Sayaka Kurenai

Sayaka has been chosen to be the successor to Ureshiko as the Manager of the Wonderland—her alias is Cruje Gapp. She believes that the Wonderland needs to be changed in order for it to be fun, and wastes no time in trying to transform it into a "cute place". Sayaka constantly demands that Ureshiko hand over the ring so that she may begin the process of remaking the world, though Ureshiko refuses every time. (Source: Wikipedia)

Shirou Inukai(犬飼 四郎)

Shirou is a mysterious Bushi and a member of the Obsidian Eight. He chases the Obsidian Goddess in order to achieve the strongest Kitetsu Sword. He is a young, tall and muscular man with short spiky silver hair. He has golden eyes and freckles on his face.

Tadokoro(タドコロ)

Umberto is a character of the day who appeared in Shell Shock! (EP091) . Umberto was a strange old man who lived on Fukuhara Island No. 4 where a Kabuto Dome Fossil was found. When Nurse Joy brought an excavation crew to help her find more Fossils, he decided to do everything he could to get rid of them. His method of choice was to dislodge giant boulders from a cliff and make them fall on them. His intention was not to hurt them but merely to scare them away. Soon, Ash and his friends spotted him and chased after him. When they caught up with him, he explained that if the Kabuto Fossils were disturbed, a red moon would appear and the island would be swallowed by the sea. Nurse Joy ignored his warning and continued to dig up the Fossils. Soon, Umberto's prediction came true. The red moon appeared, causing the Kabuto Fossils to come back to life. Nurse Joy then realized that the island must have formed around the Kabuto Fossils. Because they were being revived, the island began to fall apart. The boats were also on the other side of the island which meant that no one could escape. Umberto then told them to go to the forest to build rafts. With the help of Ash and Misty's Water-type Pokémon and the rafts, they all escaped the island. Nurse Joy later apologized to Umberto for ignoring his warning. (Source: Bulbapedia)

Gou Koga(古賀 剛)

Gou Koga is a large and bulky man who resembles a punkish biker with spiky orange hair. Even without using his doll, Koga has impressive physical strength, able to easily overpower Ichigo with just his bare hands. His doll is Dalk, a female metallic doll who can control her molecules and reshape herself at will. According to episode 83, Koga's real name is Claude Gauguin, and he lived in a European country in years past. He has lived for over 12 generations. After a falling out with Kariya over his plan to destroy Soul Society, which Koga found too extreme, Koga attempted to find and stop Kariya himself. He ended up fighting and losing to Tōshirō Hitsugaya instead, as neither he nor Dalk could contend with the extreme cold and long-range nature of Hitsugaya's Zanpakutō. He did not die, however, and was secretly taken by Yoruichi Shihōin to Rantao's home, where he was nursed back to health. Upon discovering that he was the last Bount, he apologized for the actions of his race, and Kariya in particular. He was last seen living with Rantao. No mention is made of Dalk's fate; however, considering that Bount are supposed to die with their dolls, it can be assumed that she either still exists in some form, or that Koga is merely an exception to conventional Bount rules, like Yoshino. (Source: Bleach Wiki)

Sachie Tokigawa(土岐川 幸恵)

She is Himeno's grandmother, a kind and reliable person. Not only does she work at the coffee shop, but she also participates in Koto and computer classes. She is always trying new things. - Birthday: 8th November - Blood type: Type A - Likes: Kimonos - Dislikes: Surprises (Source, Official website, translated)

Mariya Saijou(西城 まりや)

A classmate of Takeo. She begins to call Takeo "shishou" (master or teacher) after he trains her for a sports day relay race at their school.

Nobunaga Gundam Epyon(信長ガンダムエピオン)

An epic character who seeks to conquer Musha World with his own hands. He plans to eventually unite all the other worlds as well. For this reason, he has gathered excellent subordinates in various places, and has his eye on the traveling Cao Cao as well. Though he has absolute belief in his own strength, someone will entice him to obtain further power and become tainted by a wicked heart. (Source: Official Site)
candidates: wants to be seen as an adult

text:
Ichiban Natsuno(夏野 一番)

Otomi's classmate who has a crush on her. Aspires to be a pitcher in Meisei middle school's baseball club.
candidates: Afflicted with a cursed right hand
